00044         // uaddCarry
00045         template <>
00046         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint uaddCarry
00047         (
00048                 uint const & x,
00049                 uint const & y,
00050                 uint & Carry
00051         )
00052         {
00053                 uint64 Value64 = static_cast<uint64>(x) + static_cast<uint64>(y);
00054                 uint32 Result = static_cast<uint32>(Value64 % (static_cast<uint64>(1) << static_cast<uint64>(32)));
00055                 Carry = (Value64 % (static_cast<uint64>(1) << static_cast<uint64>(32))) > 1 ? static_cast<uint32>(1) : static_cast<uint32>(0);
00056                 return Result;
00057         }
00058 
00059         template <>
00060         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uvec2 uaddCarry
00061         (
00062                 uvec2 const & x,
00063                 uvec2 const & y,
00064                 uvec2 & Carry
00065         )
00066         {
00067                 return uvec2(
00068                         uaddCarry(x[0], y[0], Carry[0]),
00069                         uaddCarry(x[1], y[1], Carry[1]));
00070         }
00071

00101         // usubBorrow
00102         template <>
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint usubBorrow
00104         (
00105                 uint const & x,
00106                 uint const & y,
00107                 uint & Borrow
00108         )
00109         {
00110                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(uint) == sizeof(uint32), "uint and uint32 size mismatch");
00111 
00112                 Borrow = x >= y ? static_cast<uint32>(0) : static_cast<uint32>(1);
00113                 if(y >= x)
00114                         return y - x;
00115                 else
00116                         return static_cast<uint32>((static_cast<int64>(1) << static_cast<int64>(32)) + (static_cast<int64>(y) - static_cast<int64>(x)));
00117         }

00161         // umulExtended
00162         template <>
00163         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER void umulExtended
00164         (
00165                 uint const & x,
00166                 uint const & y,
00167                 uint & msb,
00168                 uint & lsb
00169         )
00170         {
00171                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(uint) == sizeof(uint32), "uint and uint32 size mismatch");
00172 
00173                 uint64 Value64 = static_cast<uint64>(x) * static_cast<uint64>(y);
00174                 uint32* PointerMSB = (reinterpret_cast<uint32*>(&Value64) + 1);
00175                 msb = *PointerMSB;
00176                 uint32* PointerLSB = (reinterpret_cast<uint32*>(&Value64) + 0);
00177                 lsb = *PointerLSB;
00178         }
00179

00283         // bitfieldExtract
00284         template <typename genIUType>
00285         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIUType bitfieldExtract
00286         (
00287                 genIUType const & Value,
00288                 int const & Offset,
00289                 int const & Bits
00290         )
00291         {
00292                 int GenSize = int(sizeof(genIUType)) << int(3);
00293 
00294                 assert(Offset + Bits <= GenSize);
00295 
00296                 genIUType ShiftLeft = Bits ? Value << (GenSize - (Bits + Offset)) : genIUType(0);
00297                 genIUType ShiftBack = ShiftLeft >> genIUType(GenSize - Bits);
00298 
00299                 return ShiftBack;
00300         }
00301

00303         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> bitfieldExtract
00304         (
00305                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Value,
00306                 int const & Offset,
00307                 int const & Bits
00308         )
00309         {
00310                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00311                         bitfieldExtract(Value[0], Offset, Bits),
00312                         bitfieldExtract(Value[1], Offset, Bits));
00313         }

00344         // bitfieldInsert
00345         template <typename genIUType>
00346         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIUType bitfieldInsert
00347         (
00348                 genIUType const & Base,
00349                 genIUType const & Insert,
00350                 int const & Offset,
00351                 int const & Bits
00352         )
00353         {
00354                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'bitfieldInsert' only accept integer values");
00355                 assert(Offset + Bits <= sizeof(genIUType));
00356 
00357                 if(Bits == 0)
00358                         return Base;
00359 
00360                 genIUType Mask = 0;
00361                 for(int Bit = Offset; Bit < Offset + Bits; ++Bit)
00362                         Mask |= (1 << Bit);
00363 
00364                 return (Base & ~Mask) | (Insert & Mask);
00365         }
00366 
00367         template <typename T, precision P>
00368         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> bitfieldInsert
00369         (
00370                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Base,
00371                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Insert,
00372                 int const & Offset,
00373                 int const & Bits
00374         )
00375         {
00376                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00377                         bitfieldInsert(Base[0], Insert[0], Offset, Bits),
00378                         bitfieldInsert(Base[1], Insert[1], Offset, Bits));
00379         }

00412         // bitfieldReverse
00413         template <typename genIUType>
00414         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genIUType bitfieldReverse(genIUType const & Value)
00415         {
00416                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'bitfieldReverse' only accept integer values");
00417 
00418                 genIUType Out = 0;
00419                 std::size_t BitSize = sizeof(genIUType) * 8;
00420                 for(std::size_t i = 0; i < BitSize; ++i)
00421                         if(Value & (genIUType(1) << i))
00422                                 Out |= genIUType(1) << (BitSize - 1 - i);
00423                 return Out;
00424         }       
00425 
00426         VECTORIZE_VEC(bitfieldReverse)
00427 
00428         // bitCount
00429         template <typename genIUType>
00430         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int bitCount(genIUType const & Value)
00431         {
00432                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'bitCount' only accept integer values");
00433 
00434                 int Count = 0;
00435                 for(std::size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(genIUType) * std::size_t(8); ++i)
00436                 {
00437                         if(Value & (1 << i))
00438                                 ++Count;
00439                 }
00440                 return Count;
00441         }

00479         // findLSB
00480         template <typename genIUType>
00481         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int findLSB
00482         (
00483                 genIUType const & Value
00484         )
00485         {
00486                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'findLSB' only accept integer values");
00487                 if(Value == 0)
00488                         return -1;
00489 
00490                 genIUType Bit;
00491                 for(Bit = genIUType(0); !(Value & (1 << Bit)); ++Bit){}
00492                 return Bit;
00493         }
00494

00499         )

00531         // findMSB
00532 #if((GLM_ARCH != GLM_ARCH_PURE) && (GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_VC))
00533 
00534         template <typename genIUType>
00535         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int findMSB
00536         (
00537                 genIUType const & Value
00538         )
00539         {
00540                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'findMSB' only accept integer values");
00541                 if(Value == 0)
00542                         return -1;
00543 
00544                 unsigned long Result(0);
00545                 _BitScanReverse(&Result, Value);
00546                 return int(Result);
00547         }
00548 /*
00549 // __builtin_clz seems to be buggy as it crasks for some values, from 0x00200000 to 80000000
00550 #elif((GLM_ARCH != GLM_ARCH_PURE) && (GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_GCC) && (GLM_COMPILER >= GLM_COMPILER_GCC40))
00551 
00552         template <typename genIUType>
00553         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int findMSB
00554         (
00555                 genIUType const & Value
00556         )
00557         {
00558                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'findMSB' only accept integer values");
00559                 if(Value == 0)
00560                         return -1;
00561 
00562                 // clz returns the number or trailing 0-bits; see
00563                 // http://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc-4.7.1/gcc/Other-Builtins.html
00564                 //
00565                 // NoteBecause __builtin_clz only works for unsigned ints, this
00566                 // implementation will not work for 64-bit integers.
00567                 //
00568                 return 31 - __builtin_clzl(Value);
00569         }
00570 */
00571 #else
00572 
00573 /* SSE implementation idea
00574 
00575                 __m128i const Zero = _mm_set_epi32( 0,  0,  0,  0);
00576                 __m128i const One = _mm_set_epi32( 1,  1,  1,  1);
00577                 __m128i Bit = _mm_set_epi32(-1, -1, -1, -1);
00578                 __m128i Tmp = _mm_set_epi32(Value, Value, Value, Value);
00579                 __m128i Mmi = Zero;
00580                 for(int i = 0; i < 32; ++i)
00581                 {
00582                         __m128i Shilt = _mm_and_si128(_mm_cmpgt_epi32(Tmp, One), One);
00583                         Tmp = _mm_srai_epi32(Tmp, One);
00584                         Bit = _mm_add_epi32(Bit, _mm_and_si128(Shilt, i));
00585                         Mmi = _mm_and_si128(Mmi, One);
00586                 }
00587                 return Bit;
00588 
00589 */
00590 
00591         template <typename genIUType>
00592         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER int findMSB
00593         (
00594                 genIUType const & Value
00595         )
00596         {
00597                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genIUType>::is_integer, "'findMSB' only accept integer values");
00598                 
00599                 if(Value == genIUType(0) || Value == genIUType(-1))
00600                         return -1;
00601                 else if(Value > 0)
00602                 {
00603                         genIUType Bit = genIUType(-1);
00604                         for(genIUType tmp = Value; tmp > 0; tmp >>= 1, ++Bit){}
00605                         return Bit;
00606                 }
00607                 else //if(Value < 0)
00608                 {
00609                         int const BitCount(sizeof(genIUType) * 8);
00610                         int MostSignificantBit(-1);
00611                         for(int BitIndex(0); BitIndex < BitCount; ++BitIndex)
00612                                 MostSignificantBit = (Value & (1 << BitIndex)) ? MostSignificantBit : BitIndex;
00613                         assert(MostSignificantBit >= 0);
00614                         return MostSignificantBit;
00615                 }
00616         }
00617 #endif//(GLM_COMPILER)
00618

00654 }//namespace glm
